about_the_game:
"Indies 2: Burning Kindling" is a turn-based strategy game that combines tactical chess and deck-building. The story takes place 80 years after the previous game, "Indies’ Lies "

The shadow of the malevolent deity, Indies, has engulfed the entire world, and Lady Death has summoned warriors from the past in an attempt to defy the cruel reign of the deity... Choose your team members, traverse the vast continent of Mekaa, refine your deck, arm your team, and embark on a journey to confront the malevolent deity!

Rich Team Composition

Choose three members from a diverse range of characters to form your team. Each character possesses unique mechanics, equipment, and cards. The rich team composition offers a distinct gameplay experience.

Diverse Deck Building

Each character has a unique set of cards and multiple building directions, allowing you to define your heroes based on the needs of your team. Will you be a healing hero who mends all wounds, or a malevolent sorcerer who spreads suffering? Will you be a defensive protector wielding a shield to absorb damage, or a relentless berserker fueled by bloodlust?

Dynamic Battlefield Situations

Unlike traditional deck-building games where it's a back-and-forth exchange, the tactical chess elements bring greater strategic depth. You need to combine the unique abilities of your heroes with the ever-changing battlefield situation and select the best strategy based on your hand. You can choose to dive into enemy lines to prioritize eliminating their damage dealers or maintain distance and wait for the perfect moment. Every choice you make will alter the course of the battle!

Free Preparation System

During breaks in combat, you can adjust your characters' equipment and cards. By changing decks or swapping equipment, you can maximize the strength of your team and experience the marvelous chemistry between different equipment and characters.

short_description: A turn-based strategy game that combines deck-building and tactical chess. Players control an expedition team consisting of three heroes, embarking on an adventure to find their way home. By scavenging equipment and building decks, players gradually forge their own path of battle。
